definition: toward the wind, on the side away from the wind, the side of something that is sheltered from the wind
details:
adverb
- toward the wind
= example: toward the wind
= synonyms: upwind
adjective
- on the side away from the wind
= example: on the side away from the wind
noun
- the side of something that is sheltered from the wind
= synonyms: lee, lee side
- the direction in which the wind is blowing
